Class OvalElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.renderer.elements.OvalElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRenderingElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RingElement

    @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.renderer.elements.OvalElementTest")
public class OvalElement
extends Object
implements IRenderingElement
    An oval element (should) have both a width and a height.
    Belongs to CDK module:
    renderbasic
